DOC.brief_summary: The aim project conduct feasibility study mobile phone application `` TechCare '' individual psychosis North West England .
DOC.brief_title: TechCare : Mobile-AssessmenT ThErapy PsyCHosis : An Intervention Clients Within EArly InteRvention SErvice
DOC.detailed_description: This feasibility study follow NIHR guidance feasibility study design ( NIHR , 2014 ) consist qualitative quantitative component . The study run across three strand follow 1 ) Qualitative work & Systematic review 2 ) Test run Intervention refinement 3 ) Feasibility trial .
DOC.criteria: Each client must accept Psychosis Group Lancashire Early Intervention Service . Ages 18 35 year Medication stable previous two month Clients must currently stableThe Lancashire Early Intervention Team use traffic light system indicate current symptomatology risk client . For study use client Green Light , signify currently stable . A score 3 positive symptom PANSS Minimum score 1 Calgary depression scale . Drug induce psychosis An acquire brain injury learn disability Clients undergoing assessment , formally diagnose accepted service . Lacking capacity inform consent . Ultra High Risk Developing Psychosis Group ( i.e . Prodromal , first episode )
